name: UnemploymentProcedures
title: Unemployment Procedures
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>
 The value sets in this group represent the interventions associated with unemployment as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation guide for the exchange of procedure.code.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT and CPT intervention codes that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
